Average Rating: 4.7

Kelley', 'Jonathan Shapiro', 'Lawrence Trilling', 'Ross Fineman', 'David Semel', 'Robert Lewis'], 'Starring': ['Billy Bob Thornton', 'William Hurt', 'Maria Bello'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']}
Review Text: We stayed up late many a night, wanting to see what was going to happen next.  Billy Bob Thornton is outstanding! All of the cast is great; you forget you do not know the characters personally, actually watching them through their trauma and drama.  When with friends, we end up talking about this fantastic show, all of us loving the series , each of us having a favorite part. You must watch it! You will be glad you did!
Review Title: What is going to happen next?
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
{'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Brian Percival', 'Andy Goddard', 'Jeremy Webb', 'David Evans'], 'Producers': ['Liz Trubridge', 'Gareth Neame', 'Julian Fellowes', 'Rebecca Eaton'], 'Starring': ['Huge Bonneville', 'Michelle Dockery', 'Maggie Smith'], 'Studio': ['BritBox']}
I am late in watching this show. Now, I can't wait to watch the next episode. I love the acting, the scenery the costumes and the in-depth story line. It is a mastery piece of work!
Mastery
Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa Extended Version
Comedy, Feel-good, Outrageous, Fun
['Johnny Knoxville reprises his Jackass role as 86-year-old Irving Zisman in the story of a crotchety old man unexpectedly saddled with the care of his 8-year-old grandson Billy (Jackson Nicoll). Extended Version']
{'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jeff Tremaine'], 'Producers': ['Johnny Knoxville', 'Spike Jonze', 'Jeff Tremaine', 'Derek Freda', 'Trip Taylor'], 'Starring': ['Johnny Knoxville']}
I would give it a minus 5 if there was a star for that. This is meant for the twenty something guy crowd. It was disgusting and embarrassing. The reviews said it was about a boy and his grandfather.  I never even got that far, it was so horrid.  I am too embarrassed to say how the movie even begins. My husband stared at me in disbelief. It is definitely not a family movie.  I guess I should have turned it off as soon as I saw "Jackass Presents..." I am in the dark, but not anymore.  Leave this for the guys and their immature minds.
It was disgusting and embarrassing
{'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Nancy Meyers'], 'Producers': ['Nancy Meyers', 'Suzanne Farwell', 'Scott Rudin'], 'Starring': ['Robert De Niro', 'Anne Hathaway', 'Rene Russo']}
What a sweet and loving movie.  Our daughter called us to say we had to watch this, that we would love it.  Indeed we did!
PRECIOUS
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Kirk Jones'], 'Producers': ['Rita Wilson', 'Tom Hanks', 'Gary Goetzman', 'Paul Brooks', 'Scott Niemeyer', 'Steven Shareshian', 'Nia Vardalos'], 'Starring': ['Nia Vardalos', 'John Corbett', 'Lainie Kazan'], 'Studio': ['Universal Pictures']}
We are still laughing after watching this delightful movie. It is so nice to see a movie that does not include intimate scenes or foul language. It is a wonderful family movie, filled with delight.  May you enjoy it as much as we did!
Still Laughing
The Age Of Adaline
Fantasy, Drama, Beautiful, Gentle
['Blake Lively and Harrison Ford star in this stirring romantic drama about a 29-year-old woman who has stopped aging - and the timeless power of love.']
{'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Lee Toland Krieger'], 'Producers': ['Sidney Kimmel', 'Tom Rosenberg', 'Gary Lucchesi'], 'Starring': ['Blake Lively', 'Michiel Huisman']}
This is the best movie we have seen a a long, long time. It was beautifully done. There was so much emotion in it, shared through the screen, giving us the same sorrows, laughter, tears and joy. We are still talking about it, days later!
Long, long time
{'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English', 'English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Robert Zemeckis'], 'Producers': ['Steve Starkey', 'Robert Zemeckis', 'Gary Goetzman', 'William Teitler'], 'Starring': ['Tom Hanks', 'Michael Jeter', 'Nona Gaye'], 'Studio': ['WARNER HOME VIDEO']}
As a Christmas Eve tradition, we watch The Polar Express. Though our family has watched it yearly  since it first came out, we never tire of it, all of our emotions as if we were watching it for the first time. It is an excellent movie. Tom Hanks is extraordinary as the conductor, and the children are marvelous in their parts. The artistry and creativity of this film is magnificent. Place it in your video library, beside "It's A Wonderful Life" and "Miracle on 34th Street," movies that will please you and future viewers in all of the years to come.
A Tradition

This has been a fun and exciting series to watch.  It is quite unpredictable, adding interest to the dialogue and actions.  The characters are terrific, chosen actors delightfully filling their parts well.  Go on a binge! You will not want to stop watching it!
Binge Time
Good Girls Revolt
Drama
['In 1969, while a cultural revolution swept through the free world, there was still one place that refused to change with the times: newsrooms. Good Girls Revolt follows a group of young female researchers at "News of the Week," who ask to be treated fairly. Their revolutionary request sparks convulsive changes and upends marriages, careers, sex lives, love lives, and friendships.']
{'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'Español (España)', 'Italiano', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', '日本語', 'Deutsch', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Deutsch', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Français', 'Italiano', '日本語'], 'Directors': ['Scott Winant', 'Dan Attias', 'Gloria Muzio', 'Minkie Spiro', 'Daisy von Scherler Mayer', 'Roxann Dawson'], 'Producers': ['Dana Calvo', 'Darlene Hunt', 'Lynda Obst', 'Jeff Okin', 'Scott Winant', 'Don Kurt'], 'Starring': ['Genevieve Angelson', 'Anna Camp', 'Erin Darke']}
Wow! What a terrific story. I learned so much about the period and times.  It also made me become aware why I, as a female for the college newspaper, never got a by-line. I needed these ladies to wake up my eyes to the horrid discrimination between genders. I knew about pay, but did not know how women did the work and the men got the glory. Please, please watch this.  Though it is a fictional in dialogue, the story behind it is part of our history and how women were not looked at as having intelligence in the field.  What a disgrace. Yes, yes, watch this!
It's about time to recognize the issue!

User Summary:

The user exhibits a sophisticated preference for high-quality entertainment that is driven by emotionally resonant narratives and strong character development. Their recent interactions reveal an enthusiasm for critically acclaimed dramas that explore significant social themes and complex character arcs, reinforcing their appreciation for content that blends historical context with meaningful storytelling. 

While they remain committed to family-friendly content that prioritizes uplifting themes and meaningful connections, the user recently engaged with a series that features intense emotional depth and compelling performances, indicative of their willingness to embrace narratives that contain elements of trauma and drama when executed with artistry. They emphasize a standard for excellence, especially in productions that navigate critical issues, while favoring content that avoids excessive vulgarity or explicit material. 

Their thoughtful approach to media consumption highlights a desire for entertainment that not only captivates but also inspires positivity and encourages reflection. This balance between enjoyment and moral integrity illustrates the user's discerning taste for narratives that resonate on multiple levels, combining entertainment with social awareness and emotional impact. Overall, the user seeks productions that foster personal connections, engage critical discourse among friends, and ultimately enrich their viewing experience.
